It would take some time for new schools to pop up. If a new school pops up to take advantage of this voucher, can it sustain a school on $10,000 per student per year? I don’t think so. So is there an incentive to start up new schools? I am not sure.   Parents who I have talked to in the city that I live in in Texas, who are trying to put their kids into private school, are often talking about the application process, and the fact that many of these schools are already filled up.   I will be certainly looking at the statistics as they come out in the following years.
